io.lettuce.core.masterslave

接口 NodeConnectionFactory


  • public interface NodeConnectionFactory
    Factory interface to obtain connections to Redis nodes.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.4

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <K,V> CompletableFuture<StatefulRedisConnection<K,V>> connectToNodeAsync(RedisCodec<K,V> codec, RedisURI redisURI)
      Connects to a SocketAddress with the given RedisCodec asynchronously.

    • 方法详细资料

      • connectToNodeAsync

        <K,V> CompletableFuture<StatefulRedisConnection<K,V>> connectToNodeAsync(RedisCodec<K,V> codec,
                                                                         RedisURI redisURI)
        Connects to a SocketAddress with the given RedisCodec asynchronously.
        类型参数:
        K - Key type.
        V - Value type.
        参数:
        codec - must not be null.
        redisURI - must not be null.
        返回:
        a new StatefulRedisConnection
